entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening and ending overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 then light near midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning then west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
